title: The moment when my club has no owner
body: ._. Title... I have no owner an i can invite people but no one is the owner or staff o_o

replies.body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/oc7O5QIE-club-has-disappeared?comment=003a

Clubs are kinda... er... weird right now. Give it time for Riot to make a fix.
I didnt leave though ._. and no one is the owner i asked
Somebody is automatically assigned to owner if the original owner leaves.
